alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:49PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo and northern Dawson Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 949 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Callaway, or 22 miles southwest of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eddyville, Sumner and Miller. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 216 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
